CORE_DEBUG_INFO

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x15e
Size:
0x1
Source:
regs.rdl

Description

Firmware-initiated debug information

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[7] reserved rw - -
[6] TEST_ERR rw - -
[5] TEST_END rw - -
[4] TEST_START rw - -
[3] CONFIG_END rw - -
[2] CONFIG_START rw - -
[1] RESET_END rw - -
[0] RESET_START rw - -

Field Descriptions

reserved

Unused

TEST_ERR

When 1'b1, the Firmware has detected an error and switched to idle state

TEST_END

Test end

TEST_START

Test start

CONFIG_END

Core configuration end

CONFIG_START

Core configuration start

RESET_END

Core reset procedure end

RESET_START

Core reset procedure start
